Title: "Falungong" opposes society and disrupts public order
Designer: Zhang Hongwei (张宏伟)Kong Simeng (孔思孟)
Publisher: Zhongyang minzu daxue chubanshe (中央民族大学出版社)
Notes: Sixth sheet of the series Privately encourage healthy practices, eradicate evil cults (私扬正气铲除邪教), published in 2001.The poster shows Li Hongzhi, and some of the more than 300 crimes perpetrated by the group between June 1996 and July 1999.
Theme: Privately encourage healthy practices, eradicate evil cultsFalun Gong
